## filterZip() function

Filter and zip some arrays. The `cb` is called for each slice, which is kept if `cb` returns true.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function filterZip<T1>(cb: (a: T1) => boolean, l1: Array<T1>): Array<T1>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cb | (a: T1) =&gt; boolean |  |
|  l1 | Array&lt;T1&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Array&lt;T1&gt;
